page.title: 09A WEEKEND IN MAY
page.content: {The Annual Adventure Weekend}is the main event in our village.It is organised by the Social Club.Helwith Bridge,near to Horton-in-Ribblesdale, is a hamlet with a few houses,a quarry and an unused school in which we stay. On the Adventure Weekend we go swimming,pot-holing,climbing and walking. The first night was enjoyable because we went pot-holing,wearing our old clothes. When we reached the end of a bumpy track we fitted helmets with lights onto our heads.We clambered over a wall and ran down a field,but we had difficulty in finding the entrance to the cave.We descended a 50ft ladder. The walk through the caves was immensely enjoyable.We walked to the top of Pen-y-Ghent.It seemed longer coming down than ascending.
